response.job_title: Simulation | Supply Chain | Logistics | Warehouse | Data Analytics | Project Management | Planning
response.summary: I am a very committed, responsible and creative person with a positive attitude in the face of adverse circumstances. I like teamwork aimed to achieve goals and objectives. I have leadership skills, a great capacity for learning and I adapt to different work environments easily. I am very attracted to the interaction of the different links in the supply chain, as well as fields proper to my discipline such as logistics, planning, processes, production, simulation and operations research; all of it focused on the demand of modern organizations that seek to achieve high performance.
response.skills: Process Simulation, Data Analysis, Strategic Planning, Leadership, Project Management, Supply Chain Management, Process Optimization, Problem Solving, Agile Methodologies, Analytical Skills

profile_positions.location: Middle Americas Zone (MX, CAC, CO, PE, EC)
profile_positions.description:
• Project leader, simulation of logistics operations within distribution centers using specialized software of discrete events such as FlexSim and Slot3D for warehouse productivity in the Middle Americas Zone
• Modeling of transport, warehouse, attention to production lines, picking, sorting and other logistics processes
• Agile & Scrum methodology for project management
• Support in the deployment of forklift telemetry project focused on fleet productivity and safety, as well as being a data analyst giving valuable insights to the business from the IoT data collected
• Design of experiments with "what if " scenarios, comparing multiple alternatives to choose the best one in terms of costs, resources and efficiency
profile_positions.title: T1 Warehouse & Simulation Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Development of automation applications through VBA for decision making in order to improve the accuracy of forecast adjustments in operational and tactical planning horizons
• Fundamental analysis to determine the demand behavior for beverages distributed by the company
• Support in logistics activities of demand planning and portfolio optimization
• Development of an operational monitoring plan for the category of BBC craft beers, as well as the adjustment of its demand plan in the APO planning software (Advance Planning Optimization) as a module of SAP
profile_positions.title: Demand Planning Trainee

profile_positions.description:
• Assistance during the implementation of the SPOPA information system
• Practice and internship administrators supervision and training
• Consolidation of requirements and processes in BPMN
• Evaluation of convocations and verification of requirements compliance
• Automation of unit and integration tests for information system update
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Support in the implementation of the Quality Control System ISO 9001: 2015
• Development of a database of commercialized products
• Inventory control of tools, machinery and equipment
• Review of invoices, referrals and purchase orders
profile_positions.title: Quality Assistant

profile_positions.description:
• Implementation of the Siigo Cloud accounting system
• Elaboration of invoices, quotes and cost analysis
• Inventory control of tools and equipment
• Inspection of work on site
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant

company.name: Grupo Modelo S.A. de C.V.
company.description:
Grupo Modelo es la empresa líder en México en la elaboración, distribución y venta de cerveza. Mantenemos un firme compromiso con el fomento de un mundo mejor a través del consumo responsable, iniciativas ambientales y apoyo a las comunidades en que vivimos y trabajamos. Nuestra plataforma Sueño - Gente - Cultura es la forma en la que nos conducimos y nos distingue como empresa, cumplimos nuestras responsabilidades con los consumidores, clientes, accionistas y empleados a través de la dirección, liderazgo e innovación.
En 2013 se realizó la combinación entre Grupo Modelo y AB-InBev. Desde entonces contamos con un portafolio de más de 200 marcas, incluyendo tres marcas globales: Budweiser, Stella Artois y Corona.
